projects.title: Instabot Library
projects.description: Fork of a popular Instagram API library with additional features implemented, including: stories download and upload, Like users that viewed your story, Like users based on location feed, Approve or reject pending follow requests for private accounts.

projects.title: Instabot Script
projects.description:
Completely autonomous Instagram bot capable of performing all kinds of instagram-related tasks, including:
- Post random photos, videos, stories, with random captions that include correlated quotes and emojis
- Like timeline and users based on position, hashtag, media, and more
- Follow and unfollow users based on certain conditions
- Download photos or stories
- Approve pending follow requests for private accounts
- Generate statistics with plots to visualize the growth of the account

projects.title: Xerosploit
projects.description: Man in the middle penetration testing tool. Originally developed for linux, has been ported on MacOS. Can be used to test the security of your network. It allows to perform simple MITM attacks like html/javascript injection, traffick sniffing, image replacing and more.

projects.title: Inflation Calculator
projects.description: Calculate the purchasing power over the centuries. Inflation rates are available for US dollar starting from 1774, british pound starting from 1751 and Italian lira starting from 1861. For example, a hamburger from McDonald's in 1956 dollars costs $0.15, which corresponds to €1.39 in current currency.

projects.title: BookShare
projects.description: Buy and sell books. Once a user logs in, the data are stored on Firebase database. Every user can sell a book by scanning the barcode. Using Google Books API, all the details are retrieved. The user can then add a picture, insert his location thanks to Google Places API and sell it. When someone wants to buy a book, he can send an email to the seller, get directions for that book or purchase it. In the Map controller the user can see a 2D map of the available books, and by going to the AR button, he can see the position of the books in space using Augmented Reality.
projects.skills: REST APIs, iOS, Firebase, Database, Maps, AR

projects.title: Currency Convert
projects.description: Simple foreign currency exchange rate calculator with bank fee, tax and tip. Useful when traveling abroad, as credit card companies apply a fee on purchases in foreign currency.

projects.title: Led Convert
projects.description: Calculate the equivalence, in terms of perceived brightness, between various technologies and LED devices. Moreover it shows how much money can be saved using newer technologies. The formulas used were taken from the studies of the scientists of the Lawrence Berkeley Laboratory For example a 50W incandescent light bulb can be replaced with a 8W LED light, saving about €280 annually in energy cost.

projects.title: Wallpapers
projects.description: Download great wallpapers for your iPhone.

projects.title: Secrets
projects.description: Best anonymous place to find good secrets. Various categories are available. Secrets can be searched by keyword and can be filtered by male/female.

projects.title: EnergyCost
projects.description: Calculate the cost of your electrical equipment based on the cost of electricity. For example a 4W Raspberry Pi used all day for a year costs about €8 of electricity.

projects.title: Chuck Norris Facts
projects.description: Get the greatest Chuck Norris facts right at your fingertips.

projects.title: Puma
projects.description: Cydia tweak written in Objective C that shows an alert when double tap on the statusbar with a random quote by Puma. Make your device perpendicolare.

projects.title: CalcShake
projects.description: Cydia tweak written in Objective C that makes iOS calculator buttons vibrate on press.

projects.title: Cydia Repo
projects.description: Cydia Repository with useful packages for jailbroken iOS devices.

projects.title: Global terrorism
projects.description: Visual Analytics project on terrorism attacks worldwide since 1975. The Global Terrorism Database is an open-source database including information on more than 180,000 terrorist attacks around the world from 1975 through 2017. It uses d3.js javascript library to create dynamic graphs and jvectormap to build an interactive map of the world with the number of victims divided by year. It is possible to see the number of victims by year, which type of weapons are used per month, and a lot of other charts showing interesting informations.

projects.title: Smart Gas Station
projects.description: Ruby on Rails project to find the cheapest gas stations closest to you. The data are taken from Ministero dello Sviluppo Economico and imported in a SQLite database using a custom script. The web application uses a multitude of RoR gems including Devise for user authentication, Geocoder for location, Cucumber and RSpec to write tests. A number of APIs are implemented like OpenWeatherMap, Qwant images, Google Charts, Google Maps.
projects.skills: REST APIs, Database, Ruby On Rails

projects.title: Eventi Storici
projects.description: The project uses the APIs provided by muffinlabs.com to search for all the historical events that occurred on a particular day. Once obtained, these historical events are saved, with links to the relative wikipedia page, in a file on Dropbox accessed via Oauth. Moreover the events are saved on CouchDB through working queue provided by RabbitMQ running on Docker. A random event is published on Twitter and Telegram with link wikipedia, youtube video link, image with relative description provided by Microsoft artificial intelligence.

projects.description: Website for Dana's Club, dance school in Rome.

projects.description: Website for AraMusic, a music school near Rome.

projects.title: Raspberry Pi
projects.description: Useful scripts developed for my Raspberry Pi.

projects.title: Ethereum Gas Price
projects.description: ETH Gas Price is a super simple and clean app to monitor the current gas price for the Ethereum network. You can switch between GWEI, ETH, EUR and USD.

projects.title: AiSee
projects.description: Android application to recognize dog breeds using Artificial Intelligence. TensorFlow experimentation in Java on Android with custom training model. By framing a dog with the camera, the application is able to identify the breed.

projects.title: Cups
projects.description: Small android game written in Java

projects.title: TetherFree
projects.description: Android application written in Java that allows you to enable hotspot using root.

projects.title: AutoWiFi
projects.description: This AppleScript allows you to automatically login to WiFi, without manually inserting credentials each time. It opens the network page on Google Chrome, fills the login form and connects automatically, saving a lot of time. Supported networks:

projects.title: CobSpreaBot
projects.description: Telegram Bot written in NodeJS which allows you to monitor the performance of crypto accounts 24 hours a day in order to earn, through the process of scalping, substantial percentages compared to your initial investment. Uses Firebase database.
projects.skills: REST APIs, Telegram bot, Cryptocurrency, Node.js, Firebase, Databse

projects.title: AuleBot
projects.description: Telegram Bot to find lesson hours and available rooms to study at Sapienza University.

projects.title: EtherscanBot
projects.description: Telegram bot written in NodeJS that allows to keep under control the value of multiple Ethereum wallets with a simple command. Use the etherscan.io API and Firebase database.
projects.skills: REST APIs, Telegram bot, Cryptocurrency, Node.js

projects.title: TravelCost
projects.description: Swift app to calculate the cost of a trip based on distance and vehicle consumption.

projects.title: Tripcost
projects.description: Flutter hybrid app to calculate car trip cost based on your car consumpsion.

projects.title: Inflation Calculator Flutter
projects.description: Rewrite of my original Inflation calculator app with Flutter to make it cross platform.

projects.title: Alexa skill
projects.description: Alexa skill that says random quotes by Bomba Anarchica. When invoked with your voice it can sing, tell a story, tell a fact and wish happy sunday.

projects.title: APS Progetto Cratere
projects.description: Website made with Bootstrap 4 for an association.

projects.title: Prontuario Guardie Zoofile
projects.description: Flutter app with laws used by animal keeper association. Uses firebase database.

projects.title: SmartRPA
projects.description: Python tool to train Robotic Process Automation routines in order to automatically find the best way to perform a specific user task. Includes cross-platform action logger supporting a wide range of application, high-level event abstraction, generation of abstract process diagrams, selection of the most frequent user behaviour, ability to change editable fields, generation of executable RPA script.

projects.title: E-commerce
projects.description: Full stack E-commerce website written with Angular 9 and Java Spring. Data is taken from a MySQL database through REST APIs developed with Spring. The frontend includes: Details view, Dynamic Search, Pagination, Shopping cart, Checkout form.
projects.skills: REST APIs, Database, Angular, Java Spring, Full-stack
